findings.message:
Contract locking ether found in 0x0c7b302adf4ea4dc3e0816dec4e4c664150178e1.sol:
	Contract ETHernitymining has payable functions:
	 - fallback (0x0c7b302adf4ea4dc3e0816dec4e4c664150178e1.sol#207-208)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
findings.name: locked-ether

findings.message:
ETHernitymining.claimTokens.balances (local variable @ 0x0c7b302adf4ea4dc3e0816dec4e4c664150178e1.sol) shadows:
	- BasicToken.balances (state variable @ 0x0c7b302adf4ea4dc3e0816dec4e4c664150178e1.sol#68-69)
findings.name: shadowing-local
